mapper.sql:
ic.insert_cert_id as ic_insert_cert_id, ic.talent_id as ic_talent_id, ic.`status` as ic_status, ic.`type` as ic_type, ic.create_time as ic_create_time, ic.dr as ic_dr, ic.cert_info as ic_certInfo,
ie.insert_educ_id as ie_insert_educ_id, ie.education as ie_education, ie.school as ie_school, ie.first_class as ie_first_class, ie.major as ie_major, ie.educ_picture as ie_educ_picture, ie.open_id as ie_open_id , ie.`status`as ie_status, ie.graduate_time as ie_graduate_time, ie.insert_cert_id as ie_insert_cert_id, ie.dr as ie_dr,
iq.insert_pq_id as iq_insert_pq_id, iq.category as iq_category, iq.picture as iq_picture, iq.info as iq_info, iq.`status` as iq_status, iq.insert_cert_id as iq_insert_cert_id, iq.open_id as iq_open_id, iq.dr as iq_dr,
it.insert_pt_id as it_insert_pt_id, it.category as it_category, it.info as it_info, it.picture as it_picture, it.`status` as it_status, it.insert_cert_id as it_insert_cert_id, it.open_id as it_open_id, it.dr as it_dr,
ih.insert_th_id as ih_insert_th_id, ih.honour_id as ih_honour_id, ih.honour_picture as ih_honour_picture, ih.info as ih_info, ih.`status` as ih_status, ih.insert_cert_id as ih_insert_cert_id, ih.open_id as ih_open_id, ih.dr as ih_dr
mapper.insert: insert into t_insert_certification (insert_cert_id, talent_id, `status`, `type`, create_time, dr, cert_info) values (#{insertCertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{certInfo,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into t_insert_certification
insert_cert_id,
talent_id,
`status`,
`type`,
create_time,
dr,
cert_info,

mapper.update:
update t_insert_certification
talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cert_info = #{certInfo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where insert_cert_id = #{insertCertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_insert_certification set talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cert_info = #{certInfo,jdbcType=BIGINT} where insert_cert_id = #{insertCertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_insert_certification (insert_cert_id, talent_id, `status`, `type`, create_time, dr, cert_info) values (#{insertCertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{certInfo,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select:
select
from t_insert_certification ic left join t_insert_education ie on ic.insert_cert_id = ie.insert_cert_id left join t_insert_title it on ic.insert_cert_id = it.insert_cert_id left join t_insert_quality iq on ic.insert_cert_id = iq.insert_cert_id left join t_insert_honour ih on ic.insert_cert_id = ih.insert_cert_id left join t_talent t on ic.talent_id = t.talent_id where t.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} and ic.status = 2 and ic.dr = 1

select
from t_insert_certification ic left join t_insert_education ie on ic.insert_cert_id = ie.insert_cert_id left join t_insert_title it on ic.insert_cert_id = it.insert_cert_id left join t_insert_quality iq on ic.insert_cert_id = iq.insert_cert_id left join t_insert_honour ih on ic.insert_cert_id = ih.insert_cert_id left join t_talent t on ic.talent_id = t.talent_id where t.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} and ic.insert_cert_id = #{insertCertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(ic.insert_cert_id) from t_insert_certification ic left join t_talent t on ic.talent_id = t.talent_id where t.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} and ic.type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT} and (ic.status = 1 or ic.status = 2) and ic.dr = 1
